item.description:
Common Boston invites you to join us for an open house at the newly-finished Carpenter's Center April 28th!

Details:

Open House at the Carpenters Center, Home of NERCC

Wednesday, April 28th, 6-8PM
At the Carpenters Center, home of the New England Regional Council of Carpenters
750 Dorchester Ave. Boston MA 02125
*Also accessible by the Andrews T stop.

Common Boston and the NERCC co-host an open house of the new Carpenters Center designed by ADD Inc. The NERCC will lead a short tour of their space, including a look at the LED media wall on their building facade that will display Common Boston's 2010 photo project! (More on this soon at www.cbphotoproject.org)

RSVP for this event to cbphotoproject@gmail.com by Tuesday, April 27th.

*Note: The Carpenters Center (new home of NERCC) is not to be confused with the Carpenters Center for Media and Visual Arts at Harvard.


Photo Credit: Bill Brett.
item.name: Carpenter's Center Open House
